item.title: How This Works
item.description: IntroductionThis is my first post on how this website is built. I am planning to documenting the progress of how I am setting things up. I am writing this so my kids can use this :) so hoping the explanations are detailed enough. Choices I made Build/host my website vs use blogging softwareI considered various blog/email software like medium and substack but decided to build my own site rather than use blog/email sites like Medium or Substack.
